content: If you obtain another message ending by 1 error or ... errors, there may be a mistake in your code. Are you sure all words are spelled correctly and with the exact case as shown? Are there semicolons and brackets in the appropriate spot? Are you missing a quote?  Usually, modern IDEs would try coloring the entire source as a quote in this case.
stemmed: If obtain anoth messag end 1 error ... error , may mistak code . are sure word spell correctli exact case shown ? are semicolon bracket appropri spot ? are miss quot ? usual , modern ide would tri color entir sourc quot case .
